TopicTitle: The Tasty Space Program's quest to interstellar domination!

Articles.Content:
About the TSP project:

This project aims to colonize every planet and moon in the kerbol system.

Notes:

*Expect failures...lots of failures

*Lots of Pics

*To make this a bit longer,i'll do it in career mode.

*I will update this often,i'll try to do it daily,but if i'm too busy,about 3 or 4 times a week

*I will accept suggestions and crafts from readers,so feel free to post those!

*If somebody can design a flag and send it to me,that would be appreciated

*if you wish to contact me,My email is [email protected]

*I'll be using a few mods.

EDIT:Not accepting flags anymore!i made my own!

Edited June 15, 2014 by tasteofepic

i may not be doing one today,sorry.

EDIT:nevermind!i have time!

Edited June 15, 2014 by tasteofepic

Chapter I:Orbit!except not really...

we are at the Tasty Space Center,ready to build and launch the Horizon I, which hopefully will not be a complete failure!Let's get to it!

The final product!

Hope Jeb lives through this one!

Launch!

Dang it!i ran out of fuel before i could achieve orbit!

might as well do some science...

SPAAAACE!

I had to revert to launch since my game glitched horribly...less science but at least jeb survived!

I decided to plant the flag of the TSP at my landing site...the VAB

i wrote some EVA reports and took a surface sample before i left to get as much science as possible

Tune in for the next chapter,which i may write tomorrow or later today!
well,since nobody is interested,i guess this series is no more!
Shame, I think having the first post with no real content is what did it, try getting a few reports done and ready for next time
Might want to be a bit more patient too. It's only been 2 days.

guess you're right...

- - - Updated - - -

guess i could try...
but first...i have to get a bit better at ksp
I'm interested to see where this goes.
I'm resuming today!got some more tech and science and finally achieved orbit!

CHAPTER II:Orbit at last!

While you guys were away,i got a bit more science!

enough to build this not so majestic shuttle!A 46 ton craft with barely enough fuel to get into low kerbin orbit!

but it's something!

There were a few issues moments after launch,but Gusvin Kerman,with his knowledge of rocketry,managed to stabilize the craft and For the first time in this career,i achieved orbit!

Surprisingly,Gusvin Kerman survived the whole ordeal!

I dont think i'll be letting him handle the flags anymore...

He's a good pilot though!Expect more of him in the next few chapters!

and i still dont know how gusvin managed to survive...why?because the parachute was ripped off the craft the moment i deployed it!
Gusvin might be Jeb in disguise if he survived a descent without the parachute
Makes sense,since i wont be using jeb,bill or bob in this career...
Hope you guys are liking these mission reports!please leave feedback and suggestions.

Update

It's been 3 weeks,and i havent updated this thing.i was in punta cana without access to a computer.I'll update when the 0.24 update comes out.Promise.

Chapter III:Struggle for monies!

And we're back!

this time with 0.24.

the kerbals are excited about this,now they get to learn about capitalism,money,reputation and contracts!

better yet,now there are actually negative consequences for killing kerbals!Let's get started!

We get do do jobs for money now!

Tasks for this mission:

1:test the one engine we have used the most without testing

2:test the separtron I

3:test the small gear bay

Let's get building!

since now we actually need money to build a ship,we're not allowed to build an enormous,46 ton ship that barely flies!great!

so we had to build a small ship

Perfect!

On to the mission now!

Mission successful!( yeah sorry i didnt get the screen :'( )

next batch!

TO THE MUN!!!

I've never been to the Mun,so this should be an experience.

This should work!(please work,please work,please work!)

So far so terrible!

ok it didnt work...

yeah,let's put that moon thing on hold for a while,shall we?

Kerbonauts:NO

Yes!

Next time on the TSP's quest:we try once again to go to the Mun!

Quick Update

I was planning on releasing another chapter today,but my game messed up and wouldnt launch,so i had to reinstall it.It would mean nothing if my internet connection wasnt so bad,but it is.

so maybe tomorrow!

Quick Update

New excuse!yay!im moving,so i dont have an internet connection,i dont have the screens ready,because i actually write this while i play.im writing this on my friend's personal hotspot,which wont be available tomorrow!hurray for moves!(.... you moves. .....you.)
